title: Support Ticket Escalated
description: Fired when a support ticket is escalated to a higher tier.

ticketId.description: Unique identifier for the support ticket.

previousTier.description: The support tier the ticket was previously assigned to.

newTier.description: The support tier the ticket is being escalated to.

escalatedBy.description: The entity that initiated the escalation.

priority.description: The priority level of the escalated ticket.
